text: <!channel> do any of you boozers wanna split an order of cask strength maker’s mark w me?  <https://ludwigsfinewine.com/products/makers-mark-cask-strength-750-ml>

attachments.title: Maker's Mark Cask Strength 750 ml
attachments.text: 93 points Whisky Advocate  This is what I wish the standard Maker’s Mark would be: more mature, spicier, more complex, and with a richer finish. Caramel kissed
attachments.fallback: Ludwig Fine Wine: Maker's Mark Cask Strength 750 ml
